import{useState}from'react';export const useLocalStorage=(key,initialValue)=>{// 获取初始值
const[storedValue,setStoredValue]=useState(()=>{try{const item=window.localStorage.getItem(key);return item?JSON.parse(item):initialValue;}catch(error){console.error("Error reading localStorage key \"".concat(key,"\":"),error);return initialValue;}});// 设置值的函数
const setValue=value=>{try{// 允许值是一个函数，这样我们就有了与useState相同的API
const valueToStore=value instanceof Function?value(storedValue):value;setStoredValue(valueToStore);window.localStorage.setItem(key,JSON.stringify(valueToStore));}catch(error){console.error("Error setting localStorage key \"".concat(key,"\":"),error);}};return[storedValue,setValue];};
